## About

::::: {#landing-about}
The R User Group at The University of Manchester (R.U.M.) is a special
interest group that aims to bring together R users of all levels to
share R best practices, expertise and knowledge for the benefit of all.

This friendly and supportive group is open to all staff and postgraduate
researchers at the University of Manchester, UK.

::::: {.about-grid}
:::: {.about-grid-left-col}
### Goals

- Promote the use of R at UoM
- Share R best practices
- Encourage reproducibility
::::
<!-- end: .about-grid-left-col -->

:::: {.about-grid-right-col}
### Activities

- Quarterly meetings
- Tidy Tuesdays
